<title level="2" right="Creature 4">[Copper Hand Rogue](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2485)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="LE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #158: Sixty Feet Under](/Sources.aspx?ID=47) pg. 16</row>

**Perception** +13

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Vudrani](/Languages.aspx?ID=45)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +12, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +10, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +11, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +12, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +12

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +4

**Con** +2

**Int** +0

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +1
</row>

**Items**
[Black Adder Venom](/Equipment.aspx?ID=106) (5 doses), [Hand Crossbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=69) (10 bolts), [Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), [Shortsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=43)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 21 

**Fort** +12 

**Ref** +14 

**Will** +10 

</row>

**HP** 60

**Nimble Dodge** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** A creature targets the Copper Hand rogue with an attack, and the rogue can see the attacker; **Effect** The rogue dodges out of the way, gaining a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
shortsword +14 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d6+5 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
hand crossbow +14 ([range 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 1d6 piercing

**Poison Weapon** <actions string="Single Action" />  The rogue applies one of their [black adder venom](/Equipment.aspx?ID=106) poisons to their wielded weapon. If their next attack with that weapon before the end of their next turn hits and deals damage, the target is afflicted with the poison.

**[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)**   The Copper Hand rogue deals 1d6 additional precision damage to [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creatures.

</column>
name: Copper Hand Rogue
